TJ.raw_line: This car has to go back.This car has to go back to where it came from. Put it back on the truck.Stop unhooking it. There's been a mistake.This car has to go back where it came from.It was brought here by mistake.It wasn't supposed to go anywhere. It needs to go back where it came from. The guy who sold it to you made a mistake.That's my dad. It wasn't his to sell.Yeah, but I'm just telling you it was a mistake, OK, so it needs to go back where it came from.I don't get why what I think doesn't matter.Yeah, why not?When do you look at it? When was the last time you got off the couch?Neither are all the pills you're taking, but I don't tell you not to take them.I do.Can I have some money so I can buy lunch today?Nothing.I was just, I was just going to school. I, I didn't know anyone was here.Fine.Yeah, we moved in with my Grandma for a little while.No. Thanks.Ah, if you want I guess, but I'm getting it off tomorrow, so there's no point really.Leave me alone.Yeah, yeah, I heard you. Suck your cock. Then why don't you pull it out?I didn't start anything. He pushed me.Not really.I don't understand the part about how it's not important that he pushed me and he punched me and he kicked me and he told me to suck his cock and now I'm the bad guy sitting in the office.Yeah, but I didn't -Yeah, OK.Hey.Pretty much sucked.I don't know. It just sucked.Do you want me to turn on the light for you?I don't know, maybe, a little.Whose are they?Well, can you see better with them?No. Why, has he been sleeping all day?Hey.It's six o'clock. Have you been sleeping all day?Fine. When are you going back to work?Are you gonna answer it?I'm not ready yet either.I don't know. It feels kinda weird, I can't tell.Not great. I don't know. You should probably just ask him yourself.I don't know. Am I bleeding?I don't know.I don't know, I guess?I think your ice cream's melting.What?Ah, I don't know, black?OK, red?It's really sour.OK, thanks for the ride. I really appreciate it.Shit.Thanks.I just, I dunno. I was just dumping my bike.Hey, Dad!Ah, yeah, OK.My dad'll be home soon.Why?It's through there. But why? You can't - my dad's gonna be home soon.What are you doing? You can't -You can't smoke in here.You can't smoke.What are you doing? You can't smoke in here.Will you please put it out?What?! Wait.Grandma, can I hear the rest of your story later? I'm kinda busy.He's doing laundry.I don't know.Yes.So, ah, what are you doing now?That's the garage.He's not hungry.Yeah, I'm sure.I don't know. I said he could practice his guitar in there.Yeah, sort of.Hi, Grandma.No, thanks. I don't have time.I can't, Grandma. I gotta go to school.I don't know. Can you ask me when I get home?I need to talk to you.I want to get the car back.What do I need to do to get it back?I want to get it back, though. How much do you want for it?Hey.I got you a replacement ice cream.I paid for it over there.Sure, OK. See ya.I can't Grandma. I have school tomorrow.What?What? Uh, Ok.I'll meet you there in a second.What are you doing here?What are you doing at my school?I don't wanna go.I really don't want to go.Not really.Fine.Fuck you!Fuck you. You let that fuck stick my head in a toilet and you don't do anything about it? You stand there and fucking watch him do it?You stay in my grandma's house? You're taking a bath in my fucking grandma's bath?Say something!Where are we going?Where are we going?What are we doing?What are we -What are you doing?Hey, seriously. What are you doing?Come on. This is insane. Let's get out of here.C'mon, man. Let's just go.Open the door! It's locked!You fucking ditched me.What the fuck's wrong with you?!What's wrong with you?Yeah, but -Yeah.What about?What for?But I didn't do anything.Not really.I didn't do it.It means I didn't do it.I didn't.I said I didn't do it.I can't remember what I said.What the fuck do you think!?What?Just fuck off, OK.They took my fucking finger prints!So what!? I can get into serious trouble.Yeah, that's right! They don't take this shit lightly.People could have been hurt! If someone was killed it would have been considered murder.Please just leave me alone.What?No.What are doing here?No, I'm not.What? No.Shut up about it.Shut up.Please stop saying that.Home.No thanks.Fine, just don't talk to me.Get that away from me.Hey, what are you doing?Stop the car, I want to get out.Come on man, let's just go.Hey.I have dirt in my mouth.I don't know, he's sort of moved into my grandma's house with us.No, not really, I don't know, it's kinda a long story.Sorry, I...What?My shoes are so squishy.Hesher.I don't know. I guess?I don't know.I don't know.Not really.No?Here, I got two bucks.I would.I would. If you died right now. I'd notice.Mainly because I'd be sitting in a car with a dead lady.Hey Grandma.What?! No?!What?Oh, sorry. I forgot.Yeah, well, I told you I don't want to go.I did. I told you I didn't want to go. I told you a hundred times.Yes I did. You're just not listening.What difference does it make?Shut the fuck up.What?Did you hear what he just said?My room!? You gonna start punishing me now?Shit, dad. I'm really sorry you had your ass dragged off the couch. I'm sorry you had to put some fucking underpants on for the first time in months.What?!Oh, what, soon as I'm right, that's enough?!Fine. Fuck this.Can I talk to you?I need to talk to you.I came to talk to him.It's none of your business.Just leave me alone.I got the money.The money for the car.You said if I got eighteen hundred dollars I could have the car back.What? What do you mean-What are you talking about?Where's it gone?!Where's it gone?What's going on?What!?What do you mean?Oh, Jesus.What happened?Ah, hi. It's TJ here. I, ah, I'm sorry to bug you, but um, I don't know, I guess I wanted to talk to you right now. I don't know. I have a present for you too, so maybe I'll just come drop it off or something, or ah, yeah... Um, OK. Bye.What are you doing?It's starting to rain.Fuck you. Fuck you fuck you fuck you.Fuck you. And you're a fucking whore. I hope you die. And when you do, no one's gonna fuckin' notice. Cuz you're a fat fucking prostitute.Get the fuck away from me! I'll smash you in the face, I swear to God. Back the fuck up.I never want to see you or your ugly fucking face again. That goes for both of you fucking assholes.Will you just leave me alone.Get your fucking hands away from me! I told you, I never want to see you again.Let go of me! Fuckin' let go of me.Where's my car?Where's my fucking car?You make me ask one more time, your toe's coming off. I swear to God.What?Bullshit.Because you're a fucking asshole. Tell me where it is.If you're lying, I'm gonna cut off every one of your fingers.What the fuck is wrong with you?What the fuck is wrong with you?You cut his nose off.You just cut his nose off!Hold this against your face.You gotta stop the bleeding.I want you outta my life. I'm serious. I never want to see you again. How many times do I have say it?Hi. Pizza's here, I need money.OK, pizza's here.What about the pizza?Mom can you turn on the radio?Oldies but goodies.I don't know.I don't know. I'm sorry.I know.Sorry.I'm sorry. I lost track of time.I'm sorry.I don't know.Hesher's not here.Why? What do you want?Yeah, well what do you want?Yeah, well, whatever. It doesn't really matter. I have to go.I'm sorry I broke your lamp.And I'm sorry I called you a fat prostitute.You're not fat.I dunno. Maybe.Sorry.Come in.Hey. Look at you.I hardly recognize you.Gone where?
